metadata.name: Reinvent
metadata.description:
This piece speaks to the place of bliss and emotional fortitude that can be reached with purpose. After difficult unexpected challenges, we can manifest change. Like a phoenix rises out of the ashes, we can use sheer will and courage to grasp hold of tranquility and peace again. New beginnings are possible and this piece uses 14K gold leaf to express growth and consciousness. Gold is considered to have powerful protective light color and creative force. Visualize a golden stream of light, a golden aura. 

Pilar Côté, 2022

Edition: 1 of 1


Tools: Acrylic, Gold Leaf, Photoshop
